label: Size Chart
you_are_on_plan: You are now on the {{plan}} plan!
please_enter_the_name: Please enter the name of your {{label}}
saved_successfully: Saved successfully. It may take a few seconds for the {{label}} to update on your store.
type_help_text: The link to open the {{label}} will be fixed to the side of the product page.
inline_type_help_text: The link to open the {{label}} will show within the content of the product page.
css_selector_type_help_text: The link to open the {{label}} will show at a chosen CSS selector.
snippet_only_type_help_text: The link to open the {{label}} will only be created as a snippet in your theme.
ccpops_help_text: Where would you like the {{label}} {{link_type}} to appear?
hidden_help_text: Use the field below to enter the CSS selector of the element in which to place your {{label}} link.
conditions_all_products: This {{label}} will show on all products unless you select one.
conditions_all_products_false: This {{label}} will only show explicitly on items from the below criteria.
pick_products_label: Pick products to add this {{label}} to
pick_collections_label: Pick collections to add this {{label}} to
only_one_can_be_displayed: Only one {{label}} can be displayed per Product.
if_theres_more_than_one: If there's more than one {{label}} assigned to the same Collection or Product, the most recently updated {{label}} will be shown.
specific_product: A {{label}} assigned to a specific Product will take priority over size charts assigned to a collection.
are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete {{label}}? This can't be undone.
reached_max_upgrade: You have reached the maximum number of {{label}}!
now_has_premium: {{app_name}} now has a premium subscription option!
did_you_know: Did you know, {{app_name}} has a premium subscription option?
insert_a_link: Insert a link to your {{label}} in your product page content
on_the_free_plan: On the free plan, you now have a limit of {{free_tier_chart_count_max}} {{label}}.
you_can_keep: However, because you installed the app before this limit was in place you can keep all your existing {{label}} and they will be unaffected. If you want to add any more you'll need to join {{app_name}} Premium.
downgrade_changes: You will only be allowed {{free_tier_chart_count_max}} published {{label}}. If you proceed, we will automatically set all except your latest {{free_tier_chart_count_max}} published {{label}} to Draft.
downgrade_changes_2: Any {{label}} where the link is in the content of the product page, will be changed to 'Fixed'. It's recommended you change your {{label}} Link Type to Fixed before downgrading.
downgrade_changes_3: The 'POWERED BY CLEAN SIZE CHARTS' watermark will be added to your {{label}}.
